ProductInfo.Features:
This kit includes 8 items, Camera includes all manufacturer's supplied accessories & Warranty, Additional accessories are backed with Hot Deals Electronics 1 year 100% Satisfaction Guarantee
Canon PowerShot SX280 HS 12.1 MP CMOS Digital Camera with 20x Image Stabilized Zoom 25mm Wide-Angle Lens, 1080p Full-HD Video, Built-in Wi-Fi and GPS (Black)
8 Gigabyte Secure Digital SD High Capacity Memory Card - Universal Memory Card Wallet - Lens Care & Cleaning Kit
Protective Digital Camera Carrying Case with Neck Strap & Belt Loop - Package of LCD Screen Protectors
Flexible Mini Table Top Tripod - HeroFiber® Ultra Gentle Cleaning Cloth (the most effective way to clean all optical surfaces)
